altername_name: スーパーロボット大戦30
name: Super Robot Wars 30
overview: Super Robot Wars 30 (titled スーパーロボット大戦30 in Japan) is a simulation RPG in which robots, appearing in various animations, come together to fight against common enemies. In the adventure part, the player reads the story leading up to the battle, and in the simulation part, he controls the robots placed on the map one-by-one to destroy the enemy. The battle is divided into a friendly phase and an enemy phase. The player first moves and fights the robot, and then the enemy acts. Defeat all enemies placed on the map to clear and proceed to the strategy phase. There, you can use the funds and points earned in battle to strengthen and train robots and pilots. And when you're done, the adventure part of the next scenario begins. The real thrill of Super Robot Wars is to enjoy the story of crossovers of various original works and the battle animation of robots, and to strengthen and train your favorite robots and pilots.
